keywords_explanation_array: "A sac filled with serous fluid enclosing the heart.","The exclusive muscle tissue of the heart, adapted to continued rhythmic contraction.","The two, thin-walled upper chambers of the heart.  ","The two, thick-walled lower chambers of the heart.","The partition separating the two ventricles.","The three-cusped valve located between the right atrium and the right ventricle.","The two-cusped valve located between the left atrium and the left ventricle. It is also called mitral valve.","Either of two valves located at the opening of the aorta and at the opening of the pulmonary artery.","The phase of the heartbeat when the heart contracts and pumps blood into the arteries.","The phase of the heartbeat when the heart relaxes and allows the chambers to fill with blood."
